comments.author: Mirage.2459
comments.body:
Hi all,

Legendary Tracker for Guild Wars 2 for Android

I just created an app that uses the API key to gather data from your account and show what items are required to make the original legendaries, at the moment it only displays the first 20 legendaries, but I will be adding more to it in a future update, please check it out and give me a feedback if there is anything that can be improved or if a bug has been discovered.

Otherwise please enjoy using it to track your legendary progress!!!

Thanks,
Steven.
